description: This will perform a SID check in the DCUF LPAR. This is a Healthcheck activity for the system ID.
This is to download the job output sysout from the mainframe. Use this when you need to see the log for a specific job name. This is from the DCUF LPAR.
This template starts a critical system component on the mainframe, specifically for the COM2 region.
This is a backup utility. It performs a full backup of the customer user database on the DCUB LPAR.
